v.v: When the Israelite people left Egypt,
the land of Judah became the place where people worshiped God;
When they came to the Sea of Reeds,
When they came to Mount Sinai and there was a big earthquake,
If someone asks, “What happened at the Sea of Reeds that caused the water to run away?
What happened that caused the mountains to skip like goats
Indeed, all the earth will tremble before the Lord!
He is the one who caused pools of water to flow from a rock for the Israelite people to drink,

v: when the descendants of Jacob left people who spoke a foreign language,
and Israel became the land that he ruled over.
it was as though the water saw them and ran away!
When they came to the Jordan River,
the water in the river stopped flowing so that the Israelites could cross it.
it was as though the mountains skipped like goats
and the hills jumped around like lambs.
What happened that caused the water in the Jordan River to stop flowing?
and caused the hills to jump around like lambs?”
Everyone will tremble in the presence of the God whom Jacob worshiped!
and he is the one who caused a spring to flow from a solid rock cliff!
